message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This offer reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your budget constraints.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the product's value, I still believe we can find a solution within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $15,000 for the product.
